channel.title: Video on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Docs

item.title: A state builds an "animal overpass" to protect wildlife on the highway (Figure)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 2020-11-28 13:15:06 Source: Overseas.com Report Utah State Government’s “Animal Crossover” (Social Media) Overseas.com, November 28, 2011. According to CNN (CNN) local time on the 27th, the Utah state government has built a wildlife “overpass” in order to protect local wildlife and reduce the risk of wildlife encountering traffic accidents on the highway. The bridge has reportedly seen initial results in a short period of time. Wildlife crossing an overpass (video clip)

item.title: Dogs and cats playing around accidentally catch fire! The next scene is a stunner!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Dogs and cats playing around and getting burned! The next scene is a stunner! 2020-11-26 17:00 Source: Breaking News - Breaking News - Politics Recently, a surveillance video caused a lot of discussion among netizens. In the video, dogs and cats are playing in the living room. The cat’s tail accidentally caught on an open flame on the table. The dog runs away immediately at the sight of it.
